definitions.definition: To clarify something by giving, or serving as, an example or a comparison.
definitions.example: We illustrate our definitions by including quotations or simple examples.

definitions.definition: To provide a book or other publication with pictures, diagrams or other explanatory or decorative features.
definitions.example: The economics textbook was illustrated with many graphs.

definitions.definition: To give renown or honour to; to make illustrious.
